manifest: cd external/selinux && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SamarV-121/android_vendor_extra/lineage-18.1/patches/external/selinux/0001-Revert-libsepol-Make-an-unknown-permission-an-error-.patch && patch -p1 < *.patch && cd ../.. cd frameworks/av && wget https://github.com/phhusson/platform_frameworks_av/commit/624cfc90b8bedb024f289772960f3cd7072fa940.patch && patch -p1 < *.patch && cd ../..
